chaosparticle¶

class chaosparticle.Emitter(position, amount, sprite_sheet, life, velocity, acceleration)[source]¶

Particle emitter.

Attributes:
  • particles (list): array of particles
  • life: life time of the particles
  • position: spawn position of particles
update()[source]¶

Moves and updates every attribute of particles of this emitter.

class chaosparticle.Particle(sprite_sheet, life, position, velocity, acceleration)[source]¶

One Particle.

Attributes:
  • sprite_sheet (pygame.Surface): graphical representation for the particle may be one image or a sprite sheet for animated particle
  • life (int):
  • position (list): 2d vector for position of a particle
  • velocity (list): velocity vector
  • acceleration (list): acceleration vector can be used as gravity as well
chaosparticle.get_normalized(vector)[source]¶

Returns normalized vector or None, if vector is (0, 0).

Parameters:vector (2d list) – of this vector a normalized version will be calculated
Return type:normalized version of the vector
chaosparticle.get_rotated_vector(vector, angle)[source]¶

Returns rotated and normalized 2d vector for a given angle.

Parameters:
  • vector (2d list) – of this vector a rotated version will be calculated
  • angle (float, grad) – vector will be rotated in this angle
Return type:

rotated version of the vector
